snippet: Ahead of their matchup, Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. and Representative Paul D. Ryan are lobbing personal barbs while stalking each other across the same few Midwestern states.
abstract: Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr and Rep Paul D Ryan, campaigning across the same Midwestern battleground states, are increasingly lobbing personal barbs at each other; tension between the two men, both charged with rallying white working-class voters, is likely to continue until their meeting at the vice-presidential debates.
lead_paragraph: Ahead of their matchup, Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. and Representative Paul D. Ryan are lobbing personal barbs while stalking each other across the same few Midwestern states.

headline.seo: Biden and Ryan Prepare to Meet in Debate Next Month
headline.main: Ideological Opposites Prepare to Meet in Debate
headline.print_headline: Ideological Opposites Prepare to Meet in Debate
